document.full_text: pre-existing condition insurance plans, mandated by the new health care law, opened for business last july, but many consumers still have no idea they exist, reports walecia konrad in this week's patient money column.
document.title: new pre-existing condition insurance plans
lines_and_colors: pre-existing condition insurance plans, mandated by the new health care law, opened for business last july, but many consumers still have no idea they exist, reports walecia konrad in this week's patient money column.
